member.name: T:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack
member.summary: This class defines a complete adpack object. It can be serialised or deserialised directly to the native format, and has handlers for easily adding new objects to the package.

member.name: F:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Metadata
member.summary: This defines the metadata of the package, stored in metainfo.dat.

member.name: F:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Files
member.summary: This defines the files to be stored in the package, as well as fileinfo.dat.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new, empty adpack file. The appid for the cache file to be minipulated.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Serialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Serialises the adpack to a file (ZIP).
member.param: A stream pointing to the file to write to.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Deserialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This deserializes an adpack from a file.
